name: automation
description: Open Repository to learn and explore Playwright with JavaScript, Integrated with Jenkins Jobs to schedule pipeline.  Pre-requisites: 1) Install npm 2) Install Playwright 3) Add Playwright plugins 4) Setup the Repo using the preffered methods HTTP : https://github.com/ChavhanRahul/PlaywrightProject.git 5) Try executing it locally first, if you want enhance the repo with additional feature you are welcome.
